metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: The purpose of jQuery is to make it much easier to use JavaScript on your website.
content.html: The purpose of jQuery is to make it much easier to use JavaScript on your website.

content.text: Before you start studying jQuery, you should have a basic knowledge of:
content.html: Before you start studying jQuery, you should have a basic knowledge of:

content.text: If you want to study these subjects first, find the tutorials on our Home page .
content.html: If you want to study these subjects first, find the tutorials on our Home page.

content.text: jQuery is a lightweight, "write less, do more", JavaScript library.
content.html: jQuery is a lightweight, "write less, do more", JavaScript library.

content.text: The purpose of jQuery is to make it much easier to use JavaScript on your website.
content.html: The purpose of jQuery is to make it much easier to use JavaScript on your website.

content.text: jQuery takes a lot of common tasks that require many lines of JavaScript code to accomplish, and wraps them into methods that you can call with a single line of code.
content.html: jQuery takes a lot of common tasks that require many lines of JavaScript code to accomplish, and wraps them into methods that you can call with a single line of code.

content.text: jQuery also simplifies a lot of the complicated things from JavaScript, like AJAX calls and DOM manipulation.
content.html: jQuery also simplifies a lot of the complicated things from JavaScript, like AJAX calls and DOM manipulation.

content.text: The jQuery library contains the following features:
content.html: The jQuery library contains the following features:

content.text: Tip: In addition, jQuery has plugins for almost any task out there.
content.html: Tip: In addition, jQuery has plugins for almost any task out there.

content.text: There are lots of other JavaScript libraries out there, but jQuery is probably the most popular, and also the most extendable.
content.html: There are lots of other JavaScript libraries out there, but jQuery is probably the most popular, and also the most extendable.

content.text: Many of the biggest companies on the Web use jQuery, such as:
content.html: Many of the biggest companies on the Web use jQuery, such as:

content.text: Will jQuery work in all browsers? The jQuery team knows all about cross-browser issues, and they have written this knowledge into the jQuery library. jQuery will run exactly the same in all major browsers.
content.html:
Will jQuery work in all browsers?

The jQuery team knows all about cross-browser issues, and they have written this knowledge into the jQuery library. jQuery will run exactly the same in all major browsers.
